mapper.sql: ID, MonitorType, TypeName, TypeAlias, DisplayOrder, MultiSensor, CreateType, CompanyID, ExValues
mapper.insert: insert into tb_monitor_type (MonitorType, TypeName, TypeAlias, DisplayOrder, MultiSensor, CreateType, CompanyID, ExValues) values (#{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{multiSensor,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_monitor_type
MonitorType = #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TypeName = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TypeAlias = #{typeAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DisplayOrder = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MultiSensor = #{multiSensor,jdbcType=BIT},
CreateType = #{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CompanyID = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ExValues = #{exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_monitor_type set MonitorType = #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TypeName = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TypeAlias = #{typeAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DisplayOrder = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MultiSensor = #{multiSensor,jdbcType=BIT}, CreateType = #{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CompanyID = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ExValues = #{exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) PointCount, MonitorType from tb_monitor_point where ProjectID in (select ID from tb_project_info where CompanyID = #{companyID}) group by MonitorType
